/usr/bin/c++   -std=c++11   CMakeFiles/icp_align.dir/icp_align.cpp.o  -o icp_align -rdynamic /root/Pangolin/build/src/libpangolin.so /data/code/slambook/3rdparty/Sophus/build/libSophus.so -lGLU -lGL -lSM -lICE -lX11 -lXext -lGLEW -lX11 -lpython2.7 -ldc1394 -lavcodec -lavformat -lavutil -lswscale -lOpenNI -lOpenNI2 -lpng -lz -ljpeg -ltiff -lIlmImf -Wl,-rpath,/root/Pangolin/build/src:/data/code/slambook/3rdparty/Sophus/build
